name: Ski freeVENGE
description:
NOTE: I recommend you do not play full-screen.  I wanted to emulate the feel of Ski free's aspect ratio.

It's time to take back the mountain!  The abominable yetis have thrived in the years since we last tried to ski freely, but we haven't been idle either...

Ski down the mountain and take out as many yetis as you can!  Your arsenal fires automatically and changes every 10 seconds, so stay on your toes (or skis)!

As you kill more yetis the remaining ones will be stronger and faster than those before them, so watch out for those trees and rocks because they'll kill your momentum faster than the yeti kills you!  Ski jumps can help you clear obstacles and gain a quick boost in speed, but be careful because you can't move while in the air.

Controls:

* WASD - movement

* Trees slow you down, rocks slow you down a lot.

* You go faster the longer you go without hitting an obstacle.

* Guns fire on their own and switch every 10 seconds.

I think this came out pretty well for my first compo!  Also, not only was this my first time doing pixel art but I'm not even remotely artistic lol.

Things I would have liked to do:

* More guns, especially silly ones. (I wanted to do a dubstep gun so bad)

* More interesting projectile sprites for the existing guns.

* Powerups to make weaker guns more viable later in the game

* BGM where I do all the instruments with my voice :P
